sentence: In early trading on Wednesday, shares of Cisco Systems topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 0.6%.
Year to date, Cisco Systems registers a 14.7% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Procter & Gamble, trading down 0.7%.
Procter & Gamble is showing a gain of 9.2% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Apple, trading down 0.6%, and Nike, trading up 0.6% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
